timeline.bodyText: Although FILE_TIME_INDEX is provided, ITimeIndex is heavily bound to devices, as many of its methods involve devices, which leaves FileTimeIndex in an embarrassing position. Maybe it would be better to do some abstraction between DeviceTimeIndex and ITimeIndex and put device-related methods into this abstraction.
